name: MariaDB
short_description: Open-source relational database compatible with MySQL.
description: Open-source relational database compatible with MySQL. MariaDB is a self-hosted application focused on database, storage, utility, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host MariaDB on your home server to open-source relational database compatible with mysql without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use MariaDB to manage your database workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
